tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GroupProjectData (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 student_name VARCHAR,
 project_id INT,
 sql_script TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    project_description TEXT,
    created_by INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (created_by) REFERENCES Students(student_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SQLScripts (
    script_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    script_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    script_content TEXT,
    uploaded_by INT,
    project_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (uploaded_by) REFERENCES Students(student_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES Projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Collaborations (
    collaboration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    student_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'Pending',
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES Projects(project_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES Students(student_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SQLScripts (
    script_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    script_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    script_content TEXT NOT NULL,
    author_id INT,
    project_id INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);
